price: Sobre esses são as bênçãos e a misericórdia de seu Senhor. E esses são os guiados.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ صَلَوَٰتٞ مِّن رَّبِّهِمۡ وَرَحۡمَةٞۖ وَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡمُهۡتَدُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: ulāika ʿalayhim ṣalawātun min rabbihim waraḥmatun wa-ulāika humu al-muh'tadūna
